segments.text: I'm just standing here, watching this whole scene unfold before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is quite bright, with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing so dramatically, a continuous sheet of water onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in a puddle, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so utterly unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she is to the rising tide around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting wider with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and point it out to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch this impending disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
